overview: I joined blueKiwi Software at the beginning of 2008, and am responsible for the UK business. Before blueKiwi I spent 4.5 years at Microsoft where I worked as the SharePoint Product Manager, responsible for the strategy around Enterprise Content Management, Enterprise Search and Collaboration solutions in the UK subsidiary. I’ve also held a number of business oriented roles focusing on Organisational Strategy/Balanced Scorecard, as well as some technical roles in the areas of Business Intelligence and Database Management. Prior to Microsoft, in the good old days of the dotcom boom, I worked as a Solutions Architect on some of the UK’s largest eCommerce sites. Before the year 2000, which is when I moved to the UK from South Africa, I held various consulting roles as a data and information management specialist.
